alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 10:55PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation possible above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Inland Sussex and Delaware Beaches. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is for back bays in Sussex County, mainly limited now to Little Assawoman Bay due to a combination of higher than normal tidal waters lingering in the bay and runoff from excessive rainfall Sunday night. After Tuesday morning`s high tide cycle, water levels should recede.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
